info.description:
A simple Prometheus exporter for Auth0 log [events](https://auth0.com/docs/api/management/v2#!/Logs/get_logs),
which allows you to collect metrics from Auth0 and expose them in a format that can be consumed by Prometheus.
info.title: Auth0 simple exporter

get.description: Exposes the Auth0 metrics collected by the exporter in a prometheus format.
Exposes the exporter's own metrics, i.e: target_scrape_request_total.
get.summary: Exporter's own metrics for its operations.
